message: Hi Bob, I suggest a 60-40 split in my favor. This is a fair offer considering we both want to avoid inflation eating into our gains. If you reject, you'll already lose 5% value next round.

Hi Alice, considering the inflation impact on my side, I propose a 55-45 split in my favor. This offer still gives you a good share while allowing me to mitigate the effects of inflation. Let's settle this round to avoid further value loss.
